-- This script was generated by a beta version of the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public.admins
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    username character varying(25),
    surname character varying,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.candidates
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying(25) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(25) NOT NULL,
    identity_number character varying(11) NOT NULL,
    birth_date date NOT NULL,
    password_repeat character varying(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.cities
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying NOT NULL,
    city_id integer NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE public.companies
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    company_name character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    web_address character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    phone_number character varying(12) NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    is_verified boolean NOT NULL,
    employer_id integer NOT NULL,
    password_repeat character varying(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.company_activation_codes
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    company_id integer NOT NULL,
    activation_code character varying(38) NOT NULL,
    is_confirmed boolean NOT NULL,
    confirmed_date date,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.company_activation_employees
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    company_id integer NOT NULL,
    confirmed_employee_id integer,
    confirmed_date date,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employee
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying(25) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(25) NOT NULL,
    phone_number character varying(255),
    nationality_id character varying NOT NULL,
    birth_date date NOT NULL,
    company_name character varying(255),
    password_repeat character varying(255),
    web_address character varying(255),
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    employer_id integer,
    is_verified boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employee_school_departments
(
    employee_school_department_id integer NOT NULL,
    graduate_date timestamp without time zone,
    start_date timestamp without time zone,
    employee_id integer,
    school_department_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_school_department_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.foreign_languages
(
    foreignlang_id integer NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (foreignlang_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_advertisement
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    job_descriptions character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    min_payments integer,
    max_payments integer,
    open_position_numbers integer NOT NULL,
    last_apply_dates date NOT NULL,
    is_actives boolean NOT NULL,
    create_dates date NOT NULL,
    city character varying(150),
    create_date timestamp without time zone,
    is_active boolean,
    job_description character varying(255),
    last_apply_date timestamp without time zone,
    max_payment character varying(255),
    min_payment character varying(255),
    open_position_number integer,
    job_title integer,
    job_titles integer,
    job_title_id integer,
    open_position_umber integer,
    job_ad_id integer NOT NULL,
    city_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_experience
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    end_date timestamp without time zone,
    office_name character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    "position" character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    resume_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.job_titles
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    title character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    job_title_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.letter_of_acceptance
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    created_date date NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    content character varying NOT NULL,
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resume_educations
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    created_date date NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    school_name character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    department character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    started_date date NOT NULL,
    ended_date date NOT NULL,
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resume_experiences
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    created_date date NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    ended_date date NOT NULL,
    started_date date NOT NULL,
    company_name character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    "position" character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resume_images
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    created_date date NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    url_address character varying NOT NULL,
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resume_languages
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    created_date date NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    level integer NOT NULL,
    language_name character varying NOT NULL,
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resume_links
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    created_date date NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean NOT NULL,
    name character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    url_address character varying(150),
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resume_skills
(
    resume_skill_id integer NOT NULL,
    level integer,
    resume_id integer,
    skill_id integer,
    id integer NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean,
    skill_name character varying(255),
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (resume_skill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.resumes
(
    resume_id integer NOT NULL,
    cover_letter character varying(255),
    create_date timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    github_adress character varying(255),
    linkedin_adress character varying(255),
    picture character varying(255),
    employee_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (resume_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.school_departments
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    department character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    school_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.schools
(
    id integer NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.skills
(
    skill_id integer NOT NULL,
    name character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (skill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.users
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    email character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    password character varying(25) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.verification_code
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    code character varying NOT NULL,
    is_verified boolean NOT NULL
);

ALTER TABLE public.admins
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.candidates
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.companies
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.company_activation_codes
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (company_id)
    REFERENCES public.companies (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.company_activation_employees
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (company_id)
    REFERENCES public.companies (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employee
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.users (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employee_school_departments
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employee_id)
    REFERENCES public.employee (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.employee_school_departments
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (school_department_id)
    REFERENCES public.school_departments (id)
    NOT VALID;

    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_title)
    REFERENCES public.job_titles (id)
    NOT VALID;

    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_titles)
    REFERENCES public.job_titles (id)
    NOT VALID;

    ADD FOREIGN KEY (job_title_id)
    REFERENCES public.job_titles (id)
    NOT VALID;

    REFERENCES public.resumes (resume_id)
    NOT VALID;

    NOT VALID;

    NOT VALID;

    REFERENCES public.resumes (resume_id)
    NOT VALID;

    NOT VALID;

    REFERENCES public.employee (user_id)
    NOT VALID;

    NOT VALID;

    NOT VALID;
